captions.text:
Prepare for a film so terrifying it will convince
an entire generation of kids not to be astronauts.
You’ve seen it in pulse pounding IMAX 3-D.

Now, experience the massive letdown when you
watch it on your crappy home television.

Oh, man, that's depressing. Please don't watch
this movie on your phone.

Strap in for an epic visual experience visionary
director Alfonso Cuaron spent 4 and a half
But the dialogue, not so much...

“Tell me about the hairy guy, tell me what
happened.
Qhat happened to the hairy guy?”
Blast off with the hottest astronauts ever...

Ryan Stone, who really shouldn’t be allowed
in space.
"What do I do?! What do I do?!"

“Eenie meenie... ok, that doesn't sound
good."

Matt “George Clooney” Kowalski. A George
Clooney-ish pilot with the charm of George

"I know you never realized how devastatingly
good looking I am"

And Shariff. Who’s only there for 5 minutes
before his face gets hole punched.

When their simple reapir mission literally
spirals out of control, you’ll be on the

edge of your seat, trying to hold in your
barf.
Ugh, I gotta close my eyes.
Get ready for 90 minutes of bumping into stuff

and fighting against impossible odds to grab
onto stuff.

Drift through the terrifying silence of outer
space where the only sound you can hear is
“Seven minutes to get out of here.”

“Clear skies with a chance of sattelite
debris.”

So ride along for a thrilling adventure that
will have audiences cheering when our hero
finally makes it back to Earth alive.
Even though we lost the space shuttle...
“Half of North America just lost their Facebook”

And made so much debris we won’t be able
to leave the Earth for 100’s of years.

Guess we won’t be going to Mars anytime
soon.

God that tracking shot is the coolest thing
I’ve ever seen.

That’s not a joke, I just wanted to make
sure it was on the record.
Be sure to subscribe for more Honest Trailers!
